steps.start-age-smoking: At what age did you start smoking?
steps.stop-age-smoking: At what age did you stop smoking?
steps.quit-timeframe: When do you plan to quit?
steps.past-smoker: No, but I used to smoke

alcohol.title: Alcohol Consumption
alcohol.instruction: Enter the number of drinks you have per week.
alcohol.studyNote: (According to the study: baseline is ≤100 g/week; >100–≤200 g reduces by 6 months, >200–≤350 g by 1–2 years, and >350 g by 4–5 years.)
alcohol.noConsumption: User does not report alcohol consumption.

physical-activity.title: Physical Activity
physical-activity.moderateText: Activity with an intensity of 3–5.9 MET (e.g., fast walking (4.8–6.5 km/h), slow cycling (15 km/h), painting/decorating, vacuuming, gardening (mowing the lawn), golf (pushing a cart), tennis (doubles), social dancing, and water aerobics). Breathing is accelerated but allows for speaking in full sentences.
physical-activity.vigorousText: Activity with an intensity of ≥6 MET (e.g., power walking, jogging or running, cycling over 15 km/h, strenuous gardening (continuous digging or plowing), swimming in a pool, and tennis (singles)). Breathing is very rapid and speaking is difficult.
physical-activity.exerciseMinutes: Number of exercise minutes per week
physical-activity.studyNote: (Based on the study: achieving the recommended level of physical activity can extend life by approximately 5 years.)

final.title: Final Step: Estimated Lifespan
final.changeLifeExpectancy: Here you can change the expected lifespan:
final.calendarGeneration: Age for which the memento mori calendar is generated

life.congratulationsMessage: Congratulations, you have lived longer than expected.
